title: World Series, Rajon Rondo, Cowboys, and the Lakers
itunes:title: World Series, Rajon Rondo, Cowboys, and the Lakers
description:
Colin discusses game 1 of the World Series, why he sides with Houston Rockets PG Chris Paul over Los Angeles Lakers PG Rajon Rondo, why Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones is a risk taker, and why the Los Angeles Lakers won't be firing HC Luke Walton anytime soon. Guests include Albert Breer, Joel Klatt, and Rob Parker.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
